edu.berkeley.cs.jqf.fuzz.guidance

Class NoGuidance

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.berkeley.cs.jqf.fuzz.guidance.NoGuidance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Guidance

    public class NoGuidance
extends Object
implements Guidance
    A front-end that only generates random inputs.

    This class provides no guidance to quickcheck. It seeds random values from Random, making it effectively an unguided random test input generator.

      • generateCallBack

        public Consumer<TraceEvent> generateCallBack(Thread thread)
        Returns a callback that does nothing.

        Since this is unguided random guidance, the trace events are simply ignored.

        Specified by:
        generateCallBack in interface Guidance
        Parameters:

        Returns:
